=== Personal Information ===

I'm a (1983 + this.currentDate()) years old mexican boy who loves Software Engineering.

You can contact me by email (mario_AT_monouml.org), in IRC (irc.gimp.net) in #monouml or #mono-hispano, my nickname is '''MarioC'''. If you want more daily-kind information you can always watch my <nowiki>[[http://www.mariocarrion.com/|website]]</nowiki>. <nowiki>[[http://pgp.mit.edu:11371/pks/lookup?op=get&search=0xEEB00B26|My PGP Key]]</nowiki>.
